nested.name: jsx3.net.URI
nested.text: Represents a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference.

nested.name: jsx3.net.Request
nested.text: A generic wrapper to hide the complexities and API-specifics of the native XMLHTTP control for a given browser.

nested.name: jsx3.net.Service
nested.text: This class is used in conjunction with the XML Mapping Utility to provide transactional support for those services using XML-based messaging.

nested.name: jsx3.net.URIResolver
nested.text: An interface specifying the methods necessary to define a context against which URIs are resolved.

nested.name: jsx3.net.Form
nested.text: Provides support for legacy HTML GET and POST forms.
